alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 01 at 3:17AM MST until January 01 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Priest River, Republic, Tiger, Northport, Sandpoint, Flowery Trail Road, Chesaw Road, Chewelah, Newport, Bonners Ferry, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Springdale-Hunters Road, Boulder Creek Road, Metaline Falls, Metaline, Fruitland, Sherman Pass, Kettle Falls, Inchelium, Ione, Colville, Deer Park, Clark Fork, Orin-Rice Road, Wauconda, Eastport, and Athol. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Many locations are seeing temperatures below freezing and therefore roads may become slick.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
